Content.Text:
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well hello, <MYNAME>. What can we do for you
today?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! I just had an idea. Could you hold on a
second?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, dear? What if we asked <MYNAME> to
help with collecting those materials?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eh? Oh, right. Fritz's house. Good point. Doesn't
hurt to ask, I suppose.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Howdy, <MYNAME>. How're things going with
you?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, we have a favor to ask, if you don't
mind.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, I've got this job lined up, but I'm a little
short-handed. If you could help out, that'd be a
real boon.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I told Fritz I'd patch up his roof, but I'm not sure
whether I've got enough material for the job.
<PAGE>
So what I'm lookin' for is your help collecting
some of those materials.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd really appreciate it if you could. Gunther has a
hard time turning down requests for help, so
sometimes he gets in a bit over his head.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Much appreciated. I wasn't exactly 'asked',
though.
<PAGE>
See, Fritz was here lookin' at some materials the
other day, muttering about his leaky roof, and I
couldn't help but offer to fix it.
<PAGE>
And y'know...it's Fritz, so I can't rightly ask him
to pay full price. I figured I could work with
what I had on hand, but...you see the problem.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
He said he'd go fix it today, but this morning he
discovered he doesn't have enough material for
the job.
<PAGE>
I'd go looking myself, but someone has to mind
the shop. We were just wondering what to do
when you came in.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So that's how things stand. I'm gonna head over
to Fritz's. Come along and we can pick up some
materials on the way.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Take care now!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place should be good enough.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm bettin' there are some useful branches lying
around here, so go on and pick up any you see.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be lookin' on the right side of the road, so you
take the left.
<PAGE>
Once you've gathered up everything you can,
come see me.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's get started, then.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey now, where are you goin'? Did you find
enough branches?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm thinkin' there's probably more branches lying
around here. Why don't you go take a second
look.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, that looks like plenty. Good work.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's move along, then. Since you're already
here, how about coming along the rest of the
way and carryin' those?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, Fritz! I'm here to fix your roof!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey Gunther! You really came. And you
brought <MYNAME>, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>'Course I came. A man's gotta keep his
promises, y'know.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I ended up needing more materials than I had on
hand, so I asked <MYNAME> to help me out.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? Thanks for pitching in, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'm gonna get started on that roof. Why
don't you two go on inside and relax?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sounds good to me! C'mon, <MYNAME>. You
thirsty? I've got some tea on.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well? That's some good tea, ain't it?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I might not look like the type, but I can be pretty
picky when it comes to tea. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But anyway, how 'bout that Gunther? He's a
really good guy, always willing to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
Y'know, I stopped by his shop the other day
looking for some boards to fix my leaky roof.
<PAGE>
But when he heard me, he said it was too
dangerous for me to clamber around up there,
and that I should leave it to a pro carpenter.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, it's all patched up now. Even if there's so
much wind the rain's blowin' in sideways, not a
drop's gonna get through!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose I'll head on home, then.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, Gunther, wait a sec. I gotta pay you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't you worry about that. This one's on the
house. ...Literally!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? Thanks a million! I'll bring you some
fresh veggies from my next harvest. Promise!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'd appreciate that...though I won't hold my
breath. Later.
